name: HeartHome
description:
Made for Global Game Jam, HeartHome is a game about a dog finding his way home. A gamepad or guitar hero controller is recommended. 

Credits: 

Robert - Producer, Level Designer

Vladimir  - Head Programmer

Christopher - Head Artist

Flo - Artist

Brian Coleman - Artist

Tristan Sistare - Artist

Mike Schubert - Artist

Alice Ayres - Narrative Designer

Keith Taylor - Musician
